name: Rabum
description:
Habidash's simple and stylish head covering provides warmth, along with protection from the elements and prying eyes. The Rabum is made from a synthetic extra-long cotton to be light, absorbent, and easily laundered.    
Women's sizes currently out of stock.
description_cn:
"哈比达什"的简约时尚设计可为头部提供温暖,并保护您免受偷窥. 拉布姆帽由合成的超长棉制成,质轻,吸水且易于清洗.    
女款目前缺货.
